locked_choice.text: The door is locked. Do you want to try to pick it?

statue.text: This is a statue of some guy who did a thing that was pretty cool and important, but we forgot all about him, so we just kinda made a suit of armor and called it a day\..\..\..\| Oh that's right. He's the guy that made text wrapping work. Huh. too bad we forgot his name. How many people do you think would know him?

plaque.text: It looks like something fits in here!

set spanish.text: Congratulations! By the magical power of this thingy, your language has been set to spanish!
